refentry.para: OCSP_response_status, OCSP_response_get1_basic, OCSP_response_create, OCSP_RESPONSE_free - OCSP response functions.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: OCSP_response_status() returns the OCSP response status of resp. It returns one of the values: OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_SUCCESSFUL, OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_MALFORMEDREQUEST, OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_INTERNALERROR, OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_TRYLATER OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_SIGREQUIRED, or OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_UNAUTHORIZED.
OCSP_response_get1_basic() decodes and returns the OCSP_BASICRESP structure contained in resp.
OCSP_response_create() creates and returns an OCSP_RESPONSE structure for status and optionally including basic response bs.
OCSP_RESPONSE_free() frees up OCSP reponse resp.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: OCSP_response_get1_basic() returns an OCSP_BASICRESP structure pointer or NULL if an error occurred.
OCSP_response_create() returns an OCSP_RESPONSE structure pointer or NULL if an error occurred.
OCSP_RESPONSE_free() does not return a value.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: OCSP_response_get1_basic() is only called if the status of a response is OCSP_RESPONSE_STATUS_SUCCESSFUL.

refsection.title: SEE ALSO
refsection.para: crypto(3) OCSP_cert_to_id(3) OCSP_request_add1_nonce(3) OCSP_REQUEST_new(3) OCSP_response_find_status(3) OCSP_sendreq_new(3)
